data.Name: Classless Act
data.Description: Doors 7:00 PM Show 8:00 PM THIS SHOW IS ALL AGES All support acts and times subject to change

data.Name: Classless Act
data.Bio: When they released their debut single “Give It To Me” in the summer of 2021, Classless Act were immediately praised for their ability to sound both fresh and timeless. Loudwire instantly added the song to their “Weekly Wire” Spotify playlist, identifying it as one of the top new releases of the summer. And other iconic outlets, like SPIN Magazine, were early to show support. It was a fitting public introduction to a band who embody what it means to be modern rock stars. Read more on Last.fm
